DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/unknown indicator whether the subject has taken hormone repacement therapy (estrogen and/or progesterone) at any time in the last 12 months.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the administration of treatment with estrogens or estrogen/progesterone after menopause or ovariectomy to prevent pathological effects of decreased estrogen production.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: RAEB: Treatment with estrogens or estrogen/progesterone after menopause or ovariectomy to prevent pathological effects of decreased estrogen production.

Concepts.definition: Treatment with estrogens or estrogen/progesterone after menopause or ovariectomy to prevent pathological effects of decreased estrogen production.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Have you taken hormone replac
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have you taken hormone replacement therapy (estrogen and/or progesterone at any time on the last 12 months?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient taken hormone therapy to manage vasomotor (e.g. hot flashes) or vaginal symptoms during the past month

ReferenceDocuments.name: EA1151 EC7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient currently taking birth control, estrogen, progesterone, and/or estrogen/progesterone analogs?

ReferenceDocuments.name: EA1151 EC
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient ever taken birth control, estrogen, progesterone, soy, and/or estrogen/progesterone analogs?

ReferenceDocuments.name: EA1151 EC6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient currently taking birth control, estrogen, progesterone, soy and/or estrogen/progesterone analogs?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was the therapy limited to either hormone-replacement therapy, herbal therapy for more than 1 week prior to the anticipated Cycle 1, Day 1, or palliative radiotherapy for bone metastases for more than 2 weeks prior to the anticipated Cycle 1, Day 1?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received prior progestin or anti-estrogen therapy during the 3 month before the diagnosis of endometrioid adenocarcinoma of the uterine corpus was established?

ReferenceDocuments.name: EA1151 EC8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient currently taking birth control, estrogen, progesterone, and/or estrogen/progesterone analogs prescribed by a doctor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: EA1151 - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient currently taking hormones such as estrogen, progesterone, estrogen/progesterone analogs, or hormonal birth control prescribed by a doctor?

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Chronic Disease Ind-3 (2018845v1) with VD Yes No Unknown Indicator (3506034v1) - dbw
DataElement.administrativeNotes: 2022.11.15 AQT added for ticket request CADSR0001687. ak
